subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Koy Detmer, who was kicker David Ackers's holder for six seasons, was brought back to the Eagles for the playoffs with hopes that an increased comfort level will help with Ackers's accuracy.
snippet: Quarterback Koy Detmer, who was kicker David Ackers's holder for six seasons, was brought back to the Eagles for the playoffs with hopes that an increased comfort level will help with Ackers's accuracy.
